channel.title: CVE Feed for SSSD -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SSSD -- all products

item.title: CVE-2012-3462|2024-08-06T20:05:12.697Z -- sssd -- sssd
item.description: A flaw was found in SSSD version 1.9.0. The SSSD's access-provider logic causes the result of the HBAC rule processing to be ignored in the event that the access-provider is also handling the setup of the user's SELinux user context.
